problem_text_cn: 为测量如图所示的斜坡垫的倾斜度,小明画出了斜坡垫的侧面示意图,测得的数据有:∠ABC=90°,AB=15cm,AC=35cm,则该斜坡垫的倾斜角α的正弦值是()
problem_text_en: In order to measure the slope of the slope pad as shown in the figure, Xiaoming drew the lateral view of the slope pad. The measured data are: ∠ABC = N_0, AB = N_1, AC = N_2, then the inclination angle of the slope pad α The sine of is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了解直角三角形的应用,正确掌握锐角三角函数关系是解题关键
